typography.rules: Headings must use Manrope. Body text must use DM Sans. All financial data (amounts, GSTIN, Invoice #) must use JetBrains Mono.

colors.gradients: No gradients for backgrounds. Use solid colors. Subtle gradients allowed only on primary buttons or active states (e.g., 'bg-gradient-to-r from-blue-600 to-blue-700').

layout.grid_strategy: Bento Grid Mode B (High Density). Use 'grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4' for dashboards. Ensure full height utilization.

components.buttons: Sharp or slightly rounded (rounded-md). High contrast. Primary: Blue bg, White text. Secondary: Gray bg, Dark text.
components.cards: Flat white background, 1px border (#E5E7EB), no shadow by default. Hover: border-blue-500/50 transition-colors.
components.inputs: Background #F9FAFB (gray-50), Border #E5E7EB. Focus: Ring-2 Ring-Blue-100 Border-Blue-500.
components.tables: Clean rows, no vertical borders. Header: uppercase, text-xs, text-gray-500, bg-gray-50. Rows: hover:bg-gray-50 transition-colors.
components.sidebar: Fixed left sidebar. White background, right border. Active item: bg-blue-50 text-blue-700 border-r-2 border-blue-700.

visual_enhancers.shadows: Minimalist. 'shadow-sm' for dropdowns/modals. Avoid heavy drop shadows.
visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay (opacity 0.02) allowed on login/marketing pages to kill digital flatness.
visual_enhancers.animations: Micro-interactions only. Button hover: scale-105. Page transition: fade-in (opacity 0 to 1 in 0.2s).

login_background.usage: Full screen background for Login/Signup pages with overlay

dashboard_welcome.usage: Welcome widget or empty state illustration

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px (thin and elegant). Size 20px for standard UI, 16px for dense data.

global_css.overrides: .App { text-align: left; background-color: #FFFFFF; } body { background-color: #FFFFFF; color: #0A0A0A; }

component_overrides.Button: default: h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
component_overrides.Input: h-10 rounded-md border border-input bg-gray-50 px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use gradients for backgrounds. Keep it clean white.
DO NOT use 'Inter' font. Use 'DM Sans' for body and 'Manrope' for headings.
Ensure all financial data is monospaced (JetBrains Mono).
Maintain high contrast (WCAG AA) for all text.
Dashboard grid must be dense but readable (Bento Mode B).
